articles.title: Ishan Kishan could open in Gill's absence | Cricbuzz.com - Cricbuzz - Cricbuzz
articles.description: It is also learnt that India will likely play all three spinners at Chepauk in their opening game against Australia
articles.content:
Ishan Kishan is likely to open in Shubman Gill's absence. © Sportzpics
Shubman Gill is currently sidelined and may miss several days of play. The Indian opener is at risk of sitting out a couple of … [+2415 chars]
